items.headline: Deep dive into Derivatives with the Bestselling CFA® prep course provider | With visual learning + Quizzes
objectives_summary: You will be introduced the the various types of derivatives in the markets: forwards, futures, swaps, options and credit derivatives.
You will be able to discuss the benefits and shortcomings of derivatives.
You will learn the difference between pricing and valuation for derivatives.

items.headline: Deep dive into Corporate Finance with the Bestselling CFA® prep course provider | With visual learning + Quizzes
objectives_summary: You will understand the principal–agent and other relationships in corporate governance.
You will learn stakeholder management, and the mechanisms to manage stakeholder relationships and mitigate associated risks.
You will learn the functions and responsibilities of a company’s board of directors and its committees.

items.title: CFA® Level 1 (2021/2022) - Complete Equity Investments

visible_instructors.name: PrepNuggets
visible_instructors.title: PrepNuggets | by Keith Tan, CFA
visible_instructors.job_title: #1 Complete CFA® Level I Prep Provider!

items.headline: Deep dive into Equity Investments with the Bestselling CFA® prep course provider | With visual learning + Quizzes
objectives_summary: You will learn about financial markets and intermediaries, trading positions, placement and processing of orders, primary vs secondary markets.
You will learn how to calculate the price return and total return of an index, how indexes are constructed and managed, and use of market indexes.
You will learn the definitions of market efficiency, the efficient market hypothesis, what are market anomalies, and be introduced to behavioural finance.
